nodes.text: The Genarius Jedi Enclave was a Jedi enclave that was located in the city Tolea Biqua, on the planet Genarius.
The enclave was purged by the Bane Brigade during the Sith Empire's assault on the world during the Great Galactic War.
During the SoroSuub Anniversary celebration in Tolea Biqua in 31 BBY, a number of Jedi gathered at the enclave.
